attributes.action: change the law about inheritance going to adopted children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: at the present time if a child is adopted then that child has no right to their natural parents estate after death. this is even if the child is the only surviving member of that family. the law should be changed as at the moment the goverment will gain the monies from this estate so i propose a change in the law
